name: Terra-Firma
description:
T E R R A - F I R M A

A B O U T :
Terra-firma is a retro, arcade inspired, action puzzler.

Controls:

W - jump (wall jump)

A - left  (wall slide)  

D - right  (wall slide)

I - deflect 

J - attack

F - full screen

Space - pause

                                                                                       
                                               

How to play:

N A V I G A T E  T H E  M A Z E

Use your nimble abillities  to escape the machine.

Wall slide,  jump and dash your way through the maze.  Avoid dangerous obstacles.

A T T A C KUse your dash to takedown hostile creatures.



D E F L E C T
Use your reflect ability to eliminate enemies out of your reach.

O B J E C T I V E :
There is a door hidden in the maze.  Find the keys. Your path will lighten as you progress.
